title: Can't join club
body: Friend keeps sending invite to join club. I'm not seeing an invite in the notifcation window. I'm not in one, nor have I created one.

replies.body:
Are you experiencing this in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? I tried pushing a button from our end, so go ahead and log into the client and let me know if it caused any change. If not, try using the client you haven't experienced this issue in, if you haven't already.

Let me know what happens.
